overview: Shawn Mendes brings his fans a live MTV Unplugged performance of hit tracks from his previous albums, Illuminate and Handwritten. The intimate performance took place in Downtown Los Angeles at The Theatre at Ace Hotel & aired on September 8th nationwide. Mendes’ Unplugged performance was the premiere to MTV’s ‘90s revival of the concert series.
tagline: An intimate live performance recorded in downtown Los Angeles.
title: Shawn Mendes: MTV Unplugged
